using namespace std;
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end()
#define tr(c,i) for(typeof((c).begin()) i = (c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++)
typedef long long ll; 
typedef pair<int,int> pii; 
#define FOR(i,n) for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define SZ(x) ((int)x.size())
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define sf(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define split(str) {vs.clear();istringstream ss(str);while(ss>>(str))vs.push_back(str);}
#define PI 3.141592653589793
int main()
{
	int t;
	sf(t);
	FOR(count, t)
	{
		int n, m;
		sf(n); sf(m);
		vector<int> den;
		FOR(i, n)
		{
			double a;
			scanf("%lf", &a);
			den.PB(a*100 + 0.0000001);
		}
		sort(all(den));
		reverse(all(den));
		printf("Case %d:\n", count+1);
		FOR(i,m)
		{
			double a;
			scanf("%lf", &a);
			int val = a*100 + 0.0000001;
			vector<int> count(den.size(), 0);
			FOR(j, den.size())
			{
				count[j] += val/den[j];
				val = val%den[j];
			}
			printf("Scenario %d:\n", i+1);
			FOR(j, den.size())
			{
				if(count[j] > 0)
				{
					if(den[j]%100 == 0)
						printf("%d %d\n", den[j]/100, count[j]);
					else
						printf("%.2lf %d\n", den[j]/100.0, count[j]);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
